name: logerrorcode
description: Insert unique error code in your log statements to make them easier to find later

insertlogerrorcode.serviceURL.description: URL of the service used to return error codes (null if no external service used)

insertlogerrorcode.serviceFunctionKey.description: the function key to use to access the service function (null if no external service used)

insertlogerrorcode.projectName.description: name of the project to retrieve counters for

insertlogerrorcode.counterIncrementValue.description: increment to use when requesting error code to the remote service

insertlogerrorcode.logStatementToInsert.description: statement to insert on invokation. %%counter%% is replaced with the value of the counter

insertlogerrorcode.showDebugInformation.description: set to true to have extension debug information in the output channel
